PTYPE.name: LDAP_USE_TYPE
PTYPE.pattern: all(all) nss(nss) sudo(sudo) pam(pam) nss_sudo(nss_sudo) nss_pam(nss_pam) sudo_pam(sudo_pam)

PTYPE.name: BIND_PW
PTYPE.help: String Credentials to bind (Valid Chars: ASCII printable except SPACE)

PTYPE.name: NSS_BASE_PWD
PTYPE.help: String NSS search base for password map

PTYPE.name: NSS_BASE_SHADOW
PTYPE.help: String NSS search base for shadow map

PTYPE.name: NSS_BASE_NETGRP
PTYPE.help: String NSS search base for netgroup map

PTYPE.name: NSS_BASE_SUDOERS
PTYPE.help: String NSS search base for sudoers map

PTYPE.name: NSS_INITGRP
PTYPE.help: String Init groups ignore users value

PTYPE.name: OVERRIDE_FROM
PTYPE.help: String Override attribute value map key

PTYPE.name: OVERRIDE_TO
PTYPE.help: String Override attribute value map value

PARAM.name: timelimit_val
PARAM.help: Search time limit (0 to 65535 sec); Default: 0 sec

PARAM.name: bind_timelimit_val
PARAM.help: Connect time limit (0 to 65535 sec); Default: 10 sec

PARAM.name: idle-timelimit
PARAM.help: Configures global NSS idle time limit

PARAM.name: idle_timelimit_val
PARAM.help: NSS idle time limit (0 to 65535 sec); Default: 0 sec

PARAM.name: retry_val
PARAM.help: Number of retransmit attempt (0 to 10 sec); Default: 0 sec

PARAM.name: scope_val
PARAM.help: Search scope (sub or one or base); Default: sub

PARAM.name: ssl_val
PARAM.help: TLS configuration; (on or off or start_tls); Default: off

PARAM.name: binddn
PARAM.help: Configures global distinguished name to bind

PARAM.name: pam-group-dn
PARAM.help: Configures global PAM Group Distinguished name

PARAM.name: sudoers-base
PARAM.help: Configures global sudo base distinguished name for queries

PARAM.name: nss-base-passwd
PARAM.help: Configures global NSS search base for passwd map

PARAM.name: nss-base-group
PARAM.help: Configures global NSS search base for group map

PARAM.name: nss-base-shadow
PARAM.help: Configures global NSS search base for shadow map

PARAM.name: nss-base-netgroup
PARAM.help: Configures global NSS search base for netgroup map

PARAM.name: nss-base-sudoers
PARAM.help: Configures global NSS search base for sudoers map

PARAM.name: nss-initgroups-ignoreusers
PARAM.help: Configures global NSS init groups ignore users

COMMAND.name: ldap-server source-interface
COMMAND.help: Configures source interface to be used as source IP for the LDAP packets

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure source-interface to be used for LDAP packets

COMMAND.name: ldap-server vrf
COMMAND.help: Configures VRF to be used for LDAP server connection

PARAM.name: vrf_name
PARAM.help: Name of VRF (Max: 15 characters, mgmt or prefixed with Vrf)

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure VRF tp be used for LDAP server connection

COMMAND.name: ldap-server host
COMMAND.help: Configures host name or IP address for a LDAP server

PARAM.name: host_val
PARAM.help: Hostname or IP address of LDAP server

PARAM.name: use_type_val
PARAM.help: Server type (all or nss or sudo or pam or nss_sudo or nss_pam or sudo_pam); Default: all

PARAM.name: ssl_val
PARAM.help: TLS configuration; (on or off or start_tls); Default: off

PARAM.name: retry_val
PARAM.help: Number of retransmit attempt (0 to 10 sec); Default: 0 sec

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure host for LDAP server
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# ldap-server host 4.5.6.7 use-type nss port 300 priority 12 ssl on retry 5

PARAM.name: to
PARAM.help: Configures default attribute value map value

PARAM.name: to
PARAM.help: Configures override attribute value map value

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure LDAP server map
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# ldap-server map objectclass objkey to objectVal
